msg: LUCENE-2088: AttributeSource.addAttribute should only accept interfaces, the missing test leads to problems with Token.TOKEN_ATTRIBUTE_FACTORY
This also fixes the package.html error Shai mentioned.

author: ngn
msg: Add namespaceURI to the XMLElement constructor. This is part of the large change to get full namespace support into XML parser. More changes to follow.
